name: FightCamp
headline: Home boxing gym with motion trackers that compute punches and reps.
description: With FightCamp you get access to world-class boxing and kickboxing trainers, studio-quality equipment, and performance-tracking technology — all from the comfort of your home. The key to a FightCamp workout lies in our Punch Tracking technology — we allow you to measure every strike, deliver real-time stats and fuel your competitive side.

founders.name: Patrick Chandler, Founder/CMO
founders.description:
Currently running the FightCamp marketing team, deep knowledge in Paid Social (Facebook, Instagram), Content Marketing (Youtube, SEO), Website Optimization (CRO), Email marketing and Influencer marketing. Also created the attribution modeling framework and the data analysis system we use.

Ask me about marketing strategy, attribution, building a marketing team and marketing roadmaps / decision structures.

![FightCamp Chat Icon](http://joinfightcamp.com/_nuxt/img/drift-icon.1ee3391.png)
THIS VALENTINES DAY: GET THE PARTNER WORKOUT PACK FREE ($200 VALUE) WITH YOUR FIGHTCAMP PACKAGE! 
    * [Home ](http://joinfightcamp.com/</>)
    * [Shop Now](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop/products/fightcamp>)
    * [ Why FightCamp ](http://joinfightcamp.com/</why-choose-fightcamp>)
    * [ How it Works ](http://joinfightcamp.com/</how-it-works>)


#  Stay motivated. Get stronger. 
At-home Boxing, Kickboxing, Strength Training & More 
[ Shop Now ](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop/products/fightcamp>)
[ Learn More ](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop>)
##  Build Strength For Life 
FightCamp is more than just a workout—it’s your chance to show up a little better every day. Track your punches and progress in real time. Choose from an ever-growing library of on-demand workouts. Follow along with trainers as they motivate you to push harder. 
Fitness That Keeps You Hooked 
Discover a workout that challenges and motivates you every step of the way. 
Fitness That Keeps You Hooked 
Discover a workout that challenges and motivates you every step of the way. 
Train Beyond The Body 
Achieve more than just physical gains—unlock focus, stress relief, and mental clarity. 
Train Beyond The Body 
Achieve more than just physical gains—unlock focus, stress relief, and mental clarity. 
Push Your Limits 
Proven boxing workouts to build strength and endurance. 
Push Your Limits 
Proven boxing workouts to build strength and endurance. 
##  Let’s Break Down FightCamp 
With FightCamp you get everything you need to experience the best workout of your life: 
##  Get A Brag-Worthy Bag 
The only bag that stays in place—no matter how hard you hit. Engineered for stability and durability, the FightCamp bag lets you go all-out without chasing it around your home gym. 
##  Get A Brag-Worthy Bag 
The only bag that stays in place—no matter how hard you hit. Engineered for stability and durability, the FightCamp bag lets you go all-out without chasing it around your home gym. 
[Discover Our Equipment](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop#explore-the-gym>)
##  Track Every Move, Get Fit Faster 
Real-time tracking and punch goals push you to unlock new achievements. Compete in challenges and measure your growth against the community. 
##  Track Every Move, Get Fit Faster 
Real-time tracking and punch goals push you to unlock new achievements. Compete in challenges and measure your growth against the community. 
[Discover Our Technology](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop#console-trackers>)
##  Stronger Body & Sharper Mind with Every Workout 
FightCamp’s boxing & kickboxing workouts strengthen both your body and mind. Offering more variety, and more dynamic movements, than cycling or rowing. Each session builds mental focus and physical endurance. 
##  Stronger Body & Sharper Mind with Every Workout 
FightCamp’s boxing & kickboxing workouts strengthen both your body and mind. Offering more variety, and more dynamic movements, than cycling or rowing. Each session builds mental focus and physical endurance. 
[Discover Our Workouts](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop#workout-library>)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-Men_s_Health.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-esquire.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-BI.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-TIME-Logo.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-People-Magazine.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-wired.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-forbes.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-fitt-insider.png)
![](https://cdn3.joinfightcamp.com/v4/press-Today_logo.png)
"The basic techniques for punches and kicks were taught in an accessible, responsible manner, which is more than I can say for some coaches I've worked with IRL." 
"The workouts are fun but tough. Honestly, they’ve been one of the only things that actually gets me excited to work out." 
"The quality of what's included in each FightCamp package makes the entry fee well worth the initial investment. Everything from the gloves and wraps to the free-standing bag feel like premium products, and nothing you'd have to replace anytime soon." 
"You'll get stats based on everything from your jab speed to intensity to types of punches thrown while you hone your skills." 
"I have focused myself on a workout regimen and meal plan that suits me and keeps me energized for workouts and I was lucky to find @fightcamp" 
"We tried this out at CES and our arms may never be the same." 
"Wrapping your hands and pulling on gloves is a ritualistic (and necessary) donning of armor. Each punch is harder than the last as you feel the release of whatever stress you're holding on to. The workout is almost superfluous. Or, it would be, if it wasn't so damn hard." 
"The new system, which connects four of the company’s proprietary trackers, will allow users to compete against and collaborate with friends and family members in real time, a nod to the in-home, two-player dynamic Nintendo introduced with its video game console back in the 1980s." 
"After almost a year of working out at home I had lost the motivation to really push myself during my workouts, and I had plateaued with my physical results. FightCamp helped me push through that wall." 
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/152150/5788x2576/97c1794ae8/image-4.jpg/m/fit-in/1750x0/filters:format\(jpeg\))
##  Shop FightCamp Now 
[Shop Now](http://joinfightcamp.com/</shop>)
##  Boxing outperforms every other workout, science says so 
Why settle for less when you can have the ultimate workout? Boxing engages every muscle, blending cardio, strength, and endurance for unmatched results. Build lean muscle, burn calories, sharpen your focus, and relieve stress—all in one session. Discover the science behind why boxing outperforms other workouts. 
[Learn More](http://joinfightcamp.com/</why-choose-fightcamp>)
##  Our Members Have Amazing Stories 
Hear from FightCamp Members and learn more about their journey with us. 
4.9 
21,000+ Apple Store Reviews

![Man in boxing stance in front of FightCamp bag in garage](https://a.storyblok.com/f/152150/800x1166/bc09b993c8/fc-josh-photo-002.jpg/m/200x200/filters:format\(jpeg\))

Customer Reviews 
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/152150/60x60/55d1a75c09/scott-shippey.png/m/100x100/filters:format\(png\))
Scott Shippey 
9/23/2024 
I've been a Fight Camp member for over 3 years and highly recommend it. I appreciate the various instructors' style and coaching. There are so many ways to keep the workouts fresh which is why I keep coming back. Additionally you can freeze your membership when necessary. I've done this either due to injury or travel. But I always come back and love having easy access to boxing as another form of exercise. The equipment is quality and their support via phone or email is exceptional. Highly recommend.
Read More 
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/152150/60x60/c0277bcb5d/john-corley.png/m/100x100/filters:format\(png\))
John Corley 
8/29/2024 
This is kind of a life changing program for me. I do a lot of different exercises and I have come to realize through fightcamp that the heavy bag training has become my absolute favorite. There is just so much to work on and focus on. They also have great variety, and update and gamify the platform often. They respond and listen to feedback. Also recently I lost my charger and since they are so dedicated I was immediately sent a replacement.
Great people, great platform. Thank you fightcamp.
Read More 
![customer review male avatar](https://a.storyblok.com/f/152150/106x106/4e41945265/fc-customer-review-avatar-male-icon-001.png/m/100x100/filters:format\(png\))
ladyracheld 
I absolutely LOVE FC workouts. 
8/21/2024 
I absolutely LOVE FC workouts. There's amazing variety for all types of goals and intensity levels. Being able to get my stretch and recovery routines in the same place as my workouts and being able to "stack" them to play automatically is GOLD. The one IT issue I had was handled very thoroughly and gracefully to my complete satisfaction. My only hope is that android systems would be updated to all features more in sync with apple iOS. There's a big lag between OS features.

generated_description:
**FightCamp Overview**

Founded in 2014, FightCamp emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W16 and is based in Newport Beach, California. The company is on a mission to transform how people work out at home, specializing in boxing and kickboxing fitness. With a team of 64 employees and Michael Seibel serving as a Group Partner, FightCamp has positioned itself at the intersection of hardware, fitness, and gaming.

**The Concept**

The core idea behind FightCamp is simple yet powerful: create a home boxing gym that's as engaging and motivational as traditional fitness environments. Equipped with world-class boxing trainers and studio-quality gear, FightCamp brings performance-tracking technology right into your living room. Their signature Punch Tracking technology captures every punch, providing real-time stats and goals to keep users motivated and encouraged—perfect for those who thrive on competition.

**What You Get**

With FightCamp, you're not just signing up for workouts; you're getting an integrated fitness solution. Here’s what you can expect:

1. **Premium Equipment**: Each FightCamp package includes everything you need—engineered for durability and stability, their bags stay put while you unleash your power.
   
2. **Real-Time Tracking**: Their advanced technology tracks every punch, helping you measure your progress and push your limits. You can even compete with your friends in real time.
   
3. **Expansive Workout Library**: Users have access to a vast library of on-demand workouts led by expert trainers. From boxing fundamentals to cardio-heavy kickboxing sessions, there’s something for everyone.

4. **Mind & Body Workout**: Beyond physical fitness, FightCamp promotes mental clarity and stress relief, building not just strength but focus and resilience too.

**Community and Engagement**

FightCamp has cultivated a strong community with over 21,000 reviews and a near-perfect rating in app stores. Users share testimonials about how the program revitalized their workout routines, citing the variety and engagement of classes as key factors that keep them returning. 

**Current Promotions**

Recently, FightCamp has been running promotions like a free Partner Workout Pack—a $200 value—aimed at enticing new users to try the platform.

**Final Thoughts**

Whether you’re a boxing enthusiast or a total beginner, FightCamp provides an innovative, results-driven approach to home workouts. With a promise of mastering punches, boosting strength, and having fun in a supportive environment, it’s no surprise that FightCamp has taken the fitness world by storm. If you're ready to get into the ring, check them out at [FightCamp's website](http://joinfightcamp.com).
